full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNAM SRAS KYI GA-YANG 'BOD BYA TSUL PHYVA GA-YANG BUNG BA 'GUGS PA'I PAD TSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BSKAL BZANG BRKA SHIS RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(ZHES RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA BRTEN NAS GA-YANG 'BOD BYA TSUL, PHYVA  GA-YANG BUNG BA 'GUGS PA'I PAD TSAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI TSA BO DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DANG DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG YE SHES GNYIS KYIS DNGUL MAndAL LHA RDZAS BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^ SNYOMS LAS PA SH'AKYA BTZUN BSKAL BZANG BRKA SHIS RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG YE SHES SO, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA THAMS CAD DBUL PHONGS KYI SDUG BSNGAL LAS RTAG TU GROL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
